definition: Wangcheng county in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], Hunan
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: Wangcheng is a county in the northeast of Hunan province and across the Xiangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省望城縣，居湘中東北，跨湘江尾閭。
